title: A lecture and sermon preached at different times by that faithfull minister of the Gospel, and now glorified martyr, Mr. Donald Gargill [sic]
author: Cargill, Donald, 1619?-1681.
notes: Wing and BM suggest imprint date of 1681?  Catalog of McAlpin collection in Union Theological Seminary Library gives date of 1682 with note:  "Date doubtful; probably printed after 1700."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
